vllm-project/aibrix

Open-source toolkit for building scalable LLM inference infrastructure

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Minimal vLLM engine for fast offline LLM inference with a clean Python codebase
  • framework for fast, resource-efficient LLM inference on local hardware
  • Build and train custom RL environments for LLM agents with modular tools and easy integration
  • curated list of tools and frameworks for building LLM apps
  • Benchmarks LLMs for end-to-end machine learning workflows
  • CLI tool for managing and serving LLMs with interactive terminal and server monitoring
  • multimodal LLM inference engine in Rust and Python
  • Programming language for collaborating with AI language models
